revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Puzzle item | name = Glaive seal | class = PuzzFWeapon | game = Hexen | doomednum = 9015 | puzzid = 10 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→[[Classes:PuzzleItem|PuzzleItem]]→PuzzFWeapon
A replica of [[Classes:FWeapQuietus|Quietus]] you get from killing [[Classes:FighterBoss|Zedek]] in his tomb. Along with two other replicas it's required for you to be able to open the way to Dark Crucible. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR PuzzFWeapon : {{Class|PuzzleItem}} { {{Property|PuzzleItem.Number}} 10 {{Property|Inventory.Icon}} ARTIFWEP {{Property|Inventory.PickupMessage}} "$TXT_ARTIPUZZFWEAPON" // "GLAIVE SEAL" {{Property|Tag}} "$TAG_ARTIPUZZFWEAPON" States { Spawn: AFWP A -1 Stop } }
